snippet: Paulo Bento has been sacked as coach by Greece's Olympiakos after a string of poor results, the Super League club announced on Monday....

headline.main: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East
headline.print_headline: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East

lead_paragraph: Paulo Bento has been sacked as coach by Greece's Olympiakos after a string of poor results, the Super League club announced on Monday.
